subdisciplines.name: Glaciochemistry
subdisciplines.description: The study of chemical properties and reactions in glacier environments

subdisciplines.name: Glacio-geomorphology
subdisciplines.description: The study of the shape and form of glaciers and their impact on landscapes

subdisciplines.name: Glacio-hydrology
subdisciplines.description: The study of the movement and behavior of glaciers and their impact on hydrology

subdisciplines.name: Glacio-geophysics
subdisciplines.description: The study of glaciers using geophysical methods, such as seismic surveys, radar surveys, and gravimetry

subdisciplines.name: Paleoglaciology
subdisciplines.description: The study of the history and evolution of glaciers and ice sheets, including their structures and properties
